snippet: Valérie Trierweiler, the partner of President François Hollande, supported a Socialist Party dissident running against Mr. Hollande’s former partner and the mother of his four children.
lead_paragraph: Valérie Trierweiler, the partner of President François Hollande, supported a Socialist Party dissident running against Mr. Hollande’s former partner and the mother of his four children.

headline.seo: An Endorsement from France’s First Lady Causes a Stir
headline.main: An Endorsement From France’s First Lady Causes a Stir
headline.print_headline: An Endorsement from France’s First Lady Causes a Stir
